game.name: Next Quintillionaire
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Next Quintillionaire is an entrepreneurial incremental game about selling boxes, managing demand, and growing businesses. Use your profits to make you faster (and 1E+?? richer) with every cycle!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Next Quintillionaire is an entrepreneurial incremental game about selling boxes, managing demand, and growing businesses. Use your profits to make you faster (and 1E+?? richer) with every cycle!
